channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Warning — 19 Billion Compromised Passwords Have Been Published Online
item.description: You must take action now, as security experts confirm 19 billion compromised passwords available to cybercriminals for use in account hacking attacks.
